Class GodPowerDecorator

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP027.Controller.Phase
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP027.Model.Gods.GodPowerDecorator
Direct Known Subclasses:
ApolloDecorator, AresDecorator, ArtemisDecorator, AthenaDecorator, AtlasDecorator, DemeterDecorator, HephaestusDecorator, HestiaDecorator, MedusaDecorator, MinotaurDecorator, PanDecorator, PoseidonDecorator, PrometheusDecorator, ZeusDecorator
public abstract class GodPowerDecorator
extends Phase

    Constructor Description
    GodPowerDecorator​(Phase decoratedPhase, boolean bActAsOpponentGod)
    Constructor : sets the decorated phase it is going to decorate and if the decorator will act as the owner decorator or as an opponent

    Method to get the decorated phase
    Board getGameBoard()
    Method to get the game board with which the decorated phase is playing
    Player getPlayingPlayer()
    Method to get the player who is playing the decorated phase
    Worker getWorker()
    Method to get the worker playing the decorated phase
    void Init​(Worker chosenWorker, Board gameBoard, boolean bMandatory)
    Method that sets the initial decorated phase with the chosenworker and the game board, setting the phase's type as Undefined (that will have to be changed)
    boolean IsABuildPhase()
    Method that tells if the decorated phase is a build phase
    boolean IsActingOnOpponentPlayer()
    Method that tells if the decorator acts as an opponent decorator
    boolean IsAMovePhase()
    Method that tells if the decorated phase is a move phase
    boolean IsAnEndPhase()
    Method that tells if the decorated phase is an end phase
    boolean IsMandatory()
    Method that tells if the phase is mandatory or optional
    void performActionOnCell​(Cell chosenCell)
    Method that performs the action the decorated phase has to make (if the phase if a move it will be to move the chosenworker, if it is a build it will be to build a level/dome, if it is an end it will perform a particular action that can be also a move or a build depending on the god power)
    boolean PlayerHasWon()
    Method that tells if the player who is playing the phase has won
    void SendCandidateCells​(ProtocolTypes.protocolCommand command)
    Method that sends the candidate cells evaluated by the decorated phase along with the board to the client
    void SetType​(Phase.PhaseType phaseType)
    Method that sets the type of the phase
    boolean startPhase()
    Method to call when creating the phase in order to trigger the start of the phase and the communication with the client

  • Constructor Details

    • GodPowerDecorator

      public GodPowerDecorator​(Phase decoratedPhase, boolean bActAsOpponentGod)
      Constructor : sets the decorated phase it is going to decorate and if the decorator will act as the owner decorator or as an opponent
      Parameters:
      decoratedPhase - phase to decorate
      bActAsOpponentGod - boolean that tells if the decorator will act when the card is used by an opponent or when it is used by the owner

    • IsActingOnOpponentPlayer

      public boolean IsActingOnOpponentPlayer()
      Method that tells if the decorator acts as an opponent decorator
      Returns:
      true if its power is valid when it is an opponent decorator, false if it influences the owner's phase

    • Init

      public void Init​(Worker chosenWorker, Board gameBoard, boolean bMandatory)
      Method that sets the initial decorated phase with the chosenworker and the game board, setting the phase's type as Undefined (that will have to be changed)
      Overrides:
      Init in class Phase
      Parameters:
      chosenWorker - worker chosen to play the turn (so the phase) with
      gameBoard - the currently updated board on which the player has to play the phase
      bMandatory - boolean that tells if the phase is mandatory or optional

    • performActionOnCell

      public void performActionOnCell​(Cell chosenCell)
      Method that performs the action the decorated phase has to make (if the phase if a move it will be to move the chosenworker, if it is a build it will be to build a level/dome, if it is an end it will perform a particular action that can be also a move or a build depending on the god power)
      Overrides:
